import React from 'react' import './Results.css' function Results(props) { const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); // use like this: formatter.format(yourValue); return (
{props.results.map((result) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{result.year} {formatter.format(result.savingsEndOfYear)} {formatter.format(result.yearlyInterest)} {formatter.format(result.savingsEndOfYear - props.input - result.yearlyContribution * result.year)} {formatter.format(Number(props.input) + result.yearlyContribution * result.year)}
) } export default Results
